name: The demon in-side
description:
Made for the benboonk game jam #3

Run toward ennemies as a demon to one-shot them !

SFX/Sounds effects: Chiptone

(https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)

Ambience sounds: "Horror Ambience Music (Royalty Free) [Quiet]" video on youtube

(

)

(https://www.aseprite.org/, https://lospec.com/palette-list/bloodmoon21)
